Title: Sisters
Writer: Brian De Palma (screenplay), Louisa Rose (screenplay), Brian De Palma (original story)
Actors: Margot Kidder, Jennifer Salt, Charles Durning, William Finley
Plot: The Staten Island apartment of lovely model Danielle becomes the scene of a grisly murder that is witnessed by her neighbor, Grace, a reporter. But the police don't believe her story, so it's up to Grace to solve the murder mystery on her own.
